title: Security
introduction: Security is at the core of everything we do. We implement industry-leading security measures to protect your data and ensure the integrity of our services.

encryption.title: End-to-End Encryption
encryption.description: We use state-of-the-art encryption protocols to secure data both in transit and at rest, ensuring your information remains confidential.

infrastructure.title: Secure Infrastructure
infrastructure.description: Our infrastructure is hosted in SOC 2 certified data centers with 24/7 physical security, redundant power systems, and environmental controls.

access.title: Access Control
access.description: We implement strict access controls, multi-factor authentication, and regular access reviews to protect your data.

monitoring.title: 24/7 Monitoring
monitoring.description: Our security operations center provides round-the-clock monitoring and threat detection to prevent and respond to security incidents.

certifications.title: Security Certifications
certifications.iso: Certified for information security management systems, ensuring we meet international security standards.
certifications.soc2: Independently audited for security, availability, processing integrity, confidentiality, and privacy.
certifications.gdpr: Compliant with EU data protection regulations, ensuring the highest standards of data privacy.

incident.title: Incident Response
incident.description: We maintain a comprehensive incident response plan that includes detection, analysis, containment, eradication, and recovery procedures.
incident.response: 24/7 incident response team ready to address security concerns

team.title: Security Team
team.description: Our dedicated security team consists of certified professionals with extensive experience in enterprise security, threat detection, and incident response.

contact.title: Security Contact
contact.content: For security-related inquiries or to report a security incident, please contact our security team:
